metadata.title: CVE-2020-12399 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: NSS has shown timing differences when performing DSA signatures, which wasexploitable and could eventually leak private keys. This vulnerabilityaffects Thunderbird < 68.9.0, Firefox < 77, and Firefox ESR < 68.9.

criterions.comment: nss: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
